title: Patch to BlueZ bluetooth stack
body:
Report from the client below:

Also, before using the our app, I tried https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.appground.blek

I confirmed that this app too doesnt work without the hog_lib.c patch.. :slightly_smiling_face: something to do with BlueZ, for all ANDROID based Apps.. Your patch may be a mitigation, we must get the fix properly as with this patch, the MS Designer Keyboard (physical keyboard on HOGG) is not working.. (edited)

Reproduction before patch:

On a Raspberry Pi3, you can reproduce this with the stock BlueZ stack that come installed with it:

https://gitlab.com/hercules-android-remote/android-remote/wikis/home

NOTE - To see the functionality before the patch, don't used the patched BlueZ stack provided - just build from the "official" source from BlueZ instead.

The app will pair, but button presses won't work as expected. A normal Bluetooth keyboard will work.

Reproduction after patch:

After reproducing the functionality above, you can build the patched version of BlueZ linked here:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/028y4bx2hawdz1r/bluez-5.50.zip?dl=1

The app should pair with the Raspberry Pi 3 and work as expected with the new version.

Here are the patch details for the changed build above:

The problem with this patched build is that it breaks functionality with a normal Bluetooth keyboard.

Expected change

For this ticket, we need a clearly documented patch to BlueZ that will fix compatibility with the Android apps (both this Android Remote app, and the Serverless Bluetooth Keyboard app from the Google Play Store), and won't break functionality with existing Bluetooth keyboards. You should test that all 3 of these work as expected:

  • Android Remote App (this repo)
  • https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.appground.blek
  • Standard bluetooth keyboard

The goal is to have the patch of a high enough quality that it can be merged back into the main BlueZ repo without issue.

title: Looker Tags - Various Bugs/Features
body:
1. Return numerical values need commas. ex: 654321 should be 654,321

  2. Ability to limit the number of rows rendered in a table.

  3. Ability to pass a boolean that will determine whether or not to have the rows numbered.

boolean is false:

United States
India
China

boolean is true:

1.  United States
2.  India
3.  China
  1. If no "headerName" is provided as a parameter, do not display any header.

Currently if headerName does not appear in json, the header displays with the parameter name.

  1. Currently this is the only way Contentful can read these tags if returning a list. Please find a way to make it more readable. Specifically finding a way to get around using &q;

Example of the only way it works in Contentful right now:

<Looker lookerId="1148" table="[{&q;headerName&q;: &q;Country&q;,&q;property&q;: &q;country.country_name&q;,&q;styles&q;: {&q;textAlign&q;: &q;left&q;}},{&q;headerName&q;: &q;Users Count&q;,&q;property&q;: &q;user.count&q;,&q;styles&q;: {&q;text-Align&q;: &q;right&q;}}]" />
  1. Option to put the list data in a scrolling window pane within the page and the option to determine the window pane's height (in pixels) and width (in pixels or percentage).

The content wihin this fixed-size container should be scrollable

title: - DateTime in Calendar Response
body:
Issue

The current DB table for WhattriviaEvent has a field called dateTimeStart (dateTimeEnd is not used). This was originally created in the old CMS, and all the datetimes in this column are America/New_York timezoned. Moving now to node, and heroku deployment, the dates are all screwy because some things expect the datetimes to be in UTC...

Setup

  1. Check out the current Backend develop branch
  2. Load the database file from /docs/whattrivia-db-export.tgz
  3. Load up the latest Postman Collection
  4. Run Hosts > Get Hosts Calendar in postman (the default key in there is the example I'm discussing here)

Example

When I run the Postman call against my local machine (I'm in America/New_York timezone) I get:

When I run the same code against heroku develop, I get:

Notice that the DSTAMP is correct (about a minute off of the previous screenshot) but the dates are adjusted.

When I load this calendar into Google calendar, the dates are even further off:

What I Need

  • [x] Recommended approach
    • How to fix the date retrieval from the db - Do I run a script to adjust the dates in the DB to UTC time? Account for it in the Event sequelize model?
  • [ ] A fix to get the dates and calendar to align so they show up correctly in Google Calendar
  • [ ] Confirm that any changes haven't screwed up the Events listing and Events Detail

title: New dynamic properties examples
body:
https://github.com/gladish/bleconfd/blob/master/bleconfd.json

Check out the configuration file. I’ve updated a bit since we last talked… The configuration file lists out the RPC services that are loaded/run on startup. I modified the code for “config” service to support what I’m calling dynamic_properties.

Example from that config in git:

{
      "name": "config",
      "settings":{
        "db-file": "bleconfd.ini",
        "dynamic_properties": [
          {
            "name": "mac",
            "exec": "getmac.sh"
          },
          {
            "name": "example",
            "exec": "/bin/pwd"
          }
        ]
      }
    },

That section says use the file bleconfd.ini for storage any gets/sets. If a client calls get or set on the property “mac”, it’ll exec the file “getmac.sh” like this:

Get: exec(“getmac.sh get”)

Set: exec(“getmac.sh set <value>”); where value is replaced with whatever the client is trying to set it to. see -> services/appsettings.cc

On get, whatever is returned on stdout is returned to the caller. Exit code should be zero for ok and non-zero otherwise.

I’d like to add another /bin/sh example that actually honors the command line args “get” | ”set” so that we have a nice template for people to use.

title: Auto time tracking will be stopped in the code editor even though I'm operating (not AFK)
body:
Auto time tracking will be stopped in the code editor even though I'm operating (not AFK)

Please check the video https://monosnap.com/file/DXqu9y8wEEC4akhf1f0W20g9tKEX2n

I'm scrolling the CHANGELOG.md but the time tracking stopped (you can jump to 0:40 of the video to observe it).

I also tried in the backlog page, the time tracking won't stop

For saving your time, you can change the time to 1 minute in the environment.ts and environment.prod.ts.

    inactiveTracker: {
        inactivityTime: 1,
        warningTime: 1,
    },

Steps to reproduce

  1. Run the VSCode rally extension
  2. Select a backlog then the auto time tracking starts.
  3. Switch to the code editor
  4. Do any operation, like scrolling, typing etc, but don't switch back to the backlog page.
  5. Then you can observe auto time tracking stops from the status bar below.
  6. Since then, the auto time tracking also never starts again unless you switch back to the backlog page.

Expected results

The auto time tracking should not stop if the user is not AFK.

Then create a merge request for this against the master branch. Upload a text file containing this merge request link as your submission for this F2F.

Please note that it's mandatory to follow this workflow

title: Make the operation of iOS devices in STF more smoother
body:
Currently, the iOS device remote control has an obvious delay, varying from 1-10 seconds. But The operation on Android device remote control is quite smooth.

The reason is due to WebDriverAgent needs to iterate over through all UI node of iOS, that’s inefficient. We need to explore a way to make the operations more efficiently.

Here is a comparison video for the operation on Android device and iOS device. https://monosnap.com/file/5R5iXbYwCaT8ir6Bvd3mxhmzYm3Oho

You can see the operation on the Android device is much smoother than on the iOS device.

title: Defaults modal fixes
body:
We need to bring defaults window functionality in sync with Excel. Excel file is here for reference.

Defaults window behaves differently when user has saved defaults and when not. The app curently does not reflect this. Please implement:

  1. In case of saved user/client defaults on open, defaults modal should show them not the current calculated model values.
  2. In the case of missing saved defaults, window should open with the current calculated model values. This is the crrent behavior of the app and should be working as well as 1.
  3. Clicking on the "Restore Defaults" button should populate the modal with the app's defaults and reset the client/user's saved defaults. Means delete them from the user db record. Clicking "Save" after this action should not save new defaults to user record. Means "Restore Defaults" + "Save" is equal to "Restore Defaults" + "X" the modal. Restoring the defaults means clean them from client/user record.

4. Typing in the defaults modal should trigger a global app event that carries the modal values. Then the calculator(admin and user) should listen for it and refresh charts/values.

  1. Calculation with or without user defaults should match with excel. Please, test before you submit.

If you need any clarification just ask!

title: Add endpoints for artifacts
body:
Implement the following:

Get a list of submission artifacts

  • Implement a GET /challengeSubmissions/:submissionId/artifacts endpoint that will use this to fetch submission artifacts.

Download artifact

  • Implement a GET /challengeSubmissions/:submissionId/artifacts/:artifactId/download endpoint that will use this to download an artifact. This should work similarly to how the GET /challengeSubmissions/:submissionId/download works.

Create tests

  • Cover the new endpoints with strong testing (both positive and negative).

Reproduction Steps

  1. Login as user003

  2. click "Aggregate Totals"

  3. observe the charts

Expected Result

background color for Intertediate should be blue, background color for Expert should be purple.

Actual Result

See screenshot/screencast.

Screenshots or screencast

If not attached, please check comment section.

Issue Information

Device: Mac Book Pro

OS: macOS High Sierra Version 10.14

title: Common - Staff, Fund Family, Securities, Plan Event Types, Workflow Types > Table sorting is not matched with the sorting icon
body:
1. Open the web application and login with valid staff credentials
  2. Click Staff, Fund Family, Securities, Plan Event Types or Workflow Types from the menu
  3. Click on any column sort icon (Turn into Z-A)
  4. Carefully check the table data sorting
  5. Click on any column sort icon (Turn into A-Z)
  6. Carefully check the table data sorting

Actual: Table sorting is not matched with the sorting icon

Expected: Should match the sort icon with the data sorting

Reproducibility Rate: 3/3

Environment: Chrome 71.0.3578.98 (HP Pavilion x360 14 inch; Windows 10)

title: 'Asset Management' -> "Network" -> Devices: Hide/Show Columns: Unable to select /deselect checkbox as it gone down below layout.
body:
Steps:

Click 'Asset Management' -> "Network" Add Device. Updated device with proper values so that validation should be passed. Select that device and enable "Expert Mode" from top right corner. Fill Ethernet Enable "Protocol IPv4". Fill all the other fields. Click "Apply to selected devices" Device details applied.

Now, Click on Device list "Hide/Show columns" Try to enable all expert mode checkboxs.

Now, Observed that unable to select some checkbox as it is gone down below layout.

Actual: Value of "Protocol IPv4" is not getting changed to "false" after disable of "Protocol IPv4" option.

Expected: Value of "Protocol IPv4" should be set to "false" when disabled.

Reproducible Rate: 3/3

Environment: Windows 8.1 Enterprise, 64 bit Operating System

title: After Commissioning > Select All checkbox issue
body:
1. Install the application and export the public_Mock-device-data via Start from existing CSV
  2. Click 'Asset Management' from the menu and done some changes to the devices
  3. Click 'Export' and export the data to a USB drive
  4. Click 'After Commissioning' from the menu
  5. Select the USB device and click Start Parsing click OK
  6. Click Select All
  7. Deselect the first device item
  8. Click Select All again

Actual: After user click on the select all; select all checkbox won't reset

Expected: Should reset the select all checkbox

Reproducibility Rate: 3/3

Environment: HP Pavilion x360 14 inch; Windows 10

title: Asset Management > System: Click on Cancel button after click on the 'Add Device' button still add a new row to the table
body:
1. Install the application and export the public_Mock-device-data via Start from existing CSV
  2. Click 'Asset Management' > System from the menu
  3. Enable 'Expert Mode'
  4. Click Add Device
  5. Click Cancel

Actual: Click on Cancel button after click on the 'Add Device' button still add a new row to the table

Expected: If user clicks cancel after clicking on the Add device button should remove the record from the list

Reproducibility Rate: 3/3

Environment: HP Pavilion x360 14 inch; Windows 10

title: Search: Pressing enter does not initiate a search
body:
Steps to Reproduce

  1. Move focus to the search fields and enter search terms for job and location.
  2. Press enter without moving focus to the Go button.

Expected Results

Pressing enter should move focus to the Go button.

Actual Results

Pressing enter does not initiate a search.

title: Unlabeled buttons
body:
Steps to Reproduce

http://jobs-dev.qa.zeta.comcast.net:8000/

Button elements with the class ""owl-dot"" do not have button text

 <div class=""owl-dots""><button role=""button"" class=""owl-dot""><span></span></button><button role=""button"" class=""owl-dot active""><span></span></button></div>

Expected Results

Buttons have discernable text

Actual Results

Buttons do not have discernable text

title: Landing Page: No skip link at top
body:
@dhruvit_r / @suppermancool - What I'm thinking we do with this one is:

  1. Add a new script to the wrapper to auto-generate the skip links dynamically, based on page content
  2. We'll add a top link that takes the user to the content underneath the header
  3. Then, we will look for the horizontal rule components and add those as links, so for instance we'd have a More from Comcast Careers link when this component is found:

I'm hoping this gets us most of the way to the requirement, and we can discuss with the customer further.

Is this something that's doable?

Steps to Produce

Applies to landing page.

Expected Results

Should be skipnav link at the top of all pages.

Actual Results

No skiplinks exist on landing page.

title: Improper or missing heading hierarchy
body:
Steps to Produce

N/A

Expected Results

Heading hierarchy must start with one H1 and descend to H2, H3, etc.

Actual Results

No H1 is present

title: Repetitive links "Learn more"
body:
Steps to Produce

Look for various Learn More links. Instead of just saying "Learn More", the help text should explain about what they are learning more about:

  • Landing page
    • Benefits > Learn More: "Learn more about Benefits"
    • Diversity > Learn More: "Learn more about Diversity"
    • University Relations > Learn More: "Learn more about University Relations"
  • Life at Comcast
    • Landing page - Diversity & Inclusion section

title: Mobile SMS integration - Android
body:
• Add SMS verification flow

  • Add resend verification button in Profile if cellPhone != null and cellPhoneVerified = false

  • Add in Profile->Preferences "SMS" option back. Add "WEB" option with a material-icon="public"

  • Drop notificationMethodPreferences property in UserPreference entity. We have two new properties. See below:
   /**
     * Represents the notification method preferences.
     */
    @NotNull
    @Embed
    private List<NotificationProtocolType> notificationMethods = new ArrayList<>();

    /**
     * Represents the notification method preferences.
     */
    @NotNull
    private List<String> notificationEvents = new ArrayList<>();

notificationMethods can be = "SMS", "IN_APP", "EMAIL", "WEB"

notificationEvents are retrieved from GET /notificationTypes, name property.

  • User Preference should have same options as web version

The switch will add/remove from notificationEvents array. The text will come from NotificationType.text property.

title: Underline support
body:
From the client:

Underline support seems to be missing.

Can we support that please?

Github and Gitlab don't seem to support this properly. Let's go with two underscores to indicate underline: __underline__

Can the URL link text change color with mouse Hover ? … it need not keep “clicked” history. But a color change would help indicate functionality

title: V8 build configuration
body:
In speaking with the client today, they mentioned they would like us to investigate options for V8 to reduce the memory usage.

We can remove things that aren't needed - the example they gave was ICU / localization support because that's not needed in Sparkdown.

I'd like to offer a few more suggestions in config options in the V8 build as well for things that would help with memory usage.

title: Questions and cleanup
body:
1. We had a question about needing these lines in the pxScene.sh file:
# bin files
ln -fs $externalDir/v8/out.gn/x64.release/natives_blob.bin  
ln -fs $externalDir/v8/out.gn/x64.release/snapshot_blob.bin

Can we build those bin files into the executable? We don't want to change the pxScene.sh file at all.

  1. The client has asked that we rename directory rtScriptNode to rtScriptV8

  2. The client asked if it was possible to build both Node and V8 into a single executable. It's not a big deal if we don't currently support it, but I'd like to know just what the level of effort would be to support it, thanks.

title: Test ticket
body: This is a test of TC-X in prod

title: Picklist for Related Entities
body:
1. Check out develop for the admin
  2. Check out https://gitlab.com/whattrivia-site/backend-api/tree/admin/events-tool for the backend
  3. Import the DB
  4. Run the backend: npm run dev
  5. Run the admin: npm start
  6. Log in as jimic79@whattrivia.com pw: abc123!@#
  7. Go to /events and click "New Event"

Account & Location should be a "picklist" (to use the Salesforce term). Ideal functionality here would be typeahead-search by name GET /account?name=<blah>, and select from a returned list.

In this issue, you are to create a component that:

  • [ ] 1. Has a text area that the user can type in
  • [ ] 2. When they type, it should auto-suggest entities from the associated object (For example: GET /account?name=<blah>)
  • [ ] 3. There should be a "Create New" button that opens a modal to input the minimal information needed for that entity. This modal should already have the value typed in the text area.
    • For example, if I'm searching the Create Event Account Field for "Taphouse 150", and no entities are returned, if I click Create, the modal should open with "Taphouse 150" in the Account Name field.
  • [ ] 4. When the modal is completed, it should return the value to the /events Create form as the selected entity.
  • [ ] 5. It should work in edit mode (/events/:id/edit), so the selected entity is pre-filled, but you can delete and search for another associated entity
  • [ ] 6. There should be a cancel button while editing that returns the value to it's previous state:
    • If you're in /events/create, cancel would return to an empty field
    • If you're in /events/:id/edit, it would return to the original saved value

Goals:

  1. It should be quick and easy to add new associated objects when we create events, which we do all the time
  2. The component should be generic and re-usable for other entities and relationships
  3. You may use an off the shelf component, but please extend it, adding in the button to create a new entity.
  4. The component should be easily style-able, but it does not need to match the current site style, nor use the current <MaterialInput> as there will be another issue opened to switch this admin's style to Bootstrap 4.

title: - Deleting a Meals/drugs and clicking on the back button will save the data
body:
Steps to Reproduce

  1. Login as a valid user
  2. Complete the profile data and click Generate Goals
  3. Go to Home page
  4. Tap Menu > Food/Drug
  5. Tap on an existing meal
  6. Delete one of the meals or Drugs
  7. Tap Back button
  8. Go to that meal and check the data

Actual Result(s)

  • Deleting a Meals/drugs and clicking on the back button will save the data
  • No validation popup displayed

Expected Result(s)

  • Must display a validation popup (Cancel Changes; Are you sure you want to cancel the changes?)
  • iPhone App (Comparison) Because this is the same app all the options and wording must be same

Frequency

  • 5/5

Environment Details

  • Device(s): Samsung Galaxy S5
  • Operating System: Android 6.0.1
  • Size: 5.1 inches (~69.6% screen-to-body ratio)
  • Resolution: 1080 x 1920 pixels (~432 ppi pixel density)
  • Browser(s): Chrome 64.0.3282.137

Image(s)/Video(s)/Console Log/Crash Log

title: Reporting :: Get Events with No Hosts
body:
I wanted to make a reporting endpoint so I don't bloat the other endpoints with more complexity than it already there.

This endpoint should:

  1. Return an array of Events who have no hosts assigned (associated hosts array is empty)
  2. Be paginated so we can show 5 events on the dashboard and paginated it
  3. By default, be ordered by date so the first event showing up is the "earliest"
  4. By default, only show events whose status is <= 2 (ie: Draft or Ready)

title: Fix roles assignment during login
body:
New roles assignment.

  • User will have only one role: USER, ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN. Used to allow login in Admin web.

  • UserAdminAssignment will have role: ADMIN, ORGANIZER or CREW. Used to allow permissions in Admin web (must have ADMIN role in user record).

  • UserEventAssignment will have list of roles. It can be any of ORGANIZER, CREW, SPEAKER, DELEGATE or EXHIBITOR. Used to allow permissions in Admin web (ORGANIZER, CREW) or Attendee (SPEAKER, DELEGATE or EXHIBITOR) web and Mobile.

CaaS Complement

title: - Update NodeJS and dependencies
body: Current LTS NodeJS is 8.9.2, we still use 8.2.1 - should be upgraded. Also a bunch of other dependencies should be carefully updated again.

title: - Problems on Windows
body:
Tested on IE11/Windows 10:

  • Challenge listing does not work, cause no Promise - should be double-checked, why it is not poly-filled by Babel?
  • Microsoft Edge: LoadingIndicator animation code fails because no forEach method somewhere
  • Also a couple of @font-face failed cross-origin request. Resource access is restricted. errors

Expected Job

Should be double-checked, whether these problems are still present with the current code version, and if yes - they should be fixed.

title: - LoadingIndicator triggers warnings about incorrect SSR
body: Because its states evolves right after the loading of the page, outside of ReactJS, so once ReactJS loads it sees that injected markup does not match with the browser's current content.

title: Progress KPI should not display null
body: • If Progress KPI not have value should not displayed null. Need display 0% instead.

body: It has been fixed during Bug Bash, but it look like we missed some corner-cases (most probably, it is relevant to past F2F only, where data from API are a bit surprizing).

title: Integrate/Automate Project Status
body:
Overview

Currently, project status and project plan status are two separate, independent entities. To streamline processes and increase adoption of the project plan, the project status should be integrated into project plan phases and the separate project status displayed should be eliminated.

<p></p>

Requirements

  • Total project status will still be indicated in left sidebar, but controls from the left sidebar should be modified to only allow the following actions:

    • Pause the project: A user should be able to move the project to Paused from any other project status, except Complete. If a project is moved into Paused status, the user should have the capability to move it back to In Review from the left sidebar (this control option should only be available for projects in Cancelled or Paused status).

    • Cancel the project: A user should be able to move the project to Cancelled from any other project status, except Complete. If a project is moved into Cancelled status, the user should have the capability to move it back to In Review from the left sidebar (this control option should only be available for projects in Cancelled or Paused status).

  • The remainder of project statuses will be automated through the following processes:

    • Draft: A project is only considered in draft status when the customer is completing the scope (intake) form. As soon as the form is submitted, the project should be automatically moved to In Review status.

    • In Review: Once the scope form is complete, the project should automatically be moved to In Review status as lead data is passed to SFDC on the backend. Language in the phase should instruct the customer that sales is reviewing the request and will contact them shortly.

    • Reviewed: Once an opportunity (converted from a lead) in SFDC is closed as a won opportunity, SFDC data should be passed to Connect at this stage and should automatically move the project status to Reviewed. If the lead or opportunity in SFDC is closed as a lost lead/opportunity, SFDC should pass this data to Connect and the project should automatically be moved to Cancelled status.

    • Active: A project will automatically be moved to Active status once an Architect/Copilot creates work cards and moves at least one work card into Planned status.

    • Complete: A project will automatically be moved to Complete status once all work cards on a project are marked complete. A project can revert back to Active status from Complete status if the customer indicates they want to purchase an additional phase of work or add-ons related to the same project.

<p></p>

title: Update Work Card Status Mechanism
body:
Overview

Currently, the maintenance of phase template statuses is an entirely manual effort. In the work card iteration of phase templates, we seek to automate portions of the work card status maintenance.

<p></p>

Requirements

General Requirement: Architects/Copilots should always have the capability to manually update the status of a work card, even if automations are in-place.

  • Draft: A work card will be in this status as an Architect/Copilot is creating the work card. This status will be automatically set as the first status of a work card.

  • Planned: A work card will be manually moved into this status by an Architect/Copilot once they have completed the set-up of the work card. At this time, the work card will become visible to customer users. Additionally, moving a work card into Planned status will automatically trigger the project status to move into Active status.

  • In Progress:

    • If a work card is kept generic (meaning that no challenges/tasks are linked to it), the Architect/Copilot will have to manually update the work card status to In Progress.

    • If a work card has challenges/tasks linked to it, the work card should automatically be moved into In Progress as soon as the first challenge/task is initiated.

    • Architects/Copilots should have the capability to revert the work card status back to Planned.

  • Complete:

    • If a work card is kept generic (meaning that no challenges/tasks are linked to it), the Architect/Copilot will have to manually update the work card status to Complete.

    • If a work card has challenges/tasks linked to it, the work card should automatically be moved to Complete once the final challenge/task has been completed.

    • Architects/Copilots should have the capability to move a work card back to In Progress from Complete in the event an additional challenge or task needs to be added to the work card.

title: Update File & Link Sharing
body:
Overview

Currently, when a link or file is shared in a phase template it is not reflected in the left sidebar. In the new work card iteration of phase templates, we want to ensure that files/links shared are captured in the total project Library (re: Navigation alignment w/ Community feature in the left sidebar) as well as in an in-work card file and link library.

<p></p>

Requirements

  • When a file or link is shared in a work card discussion post it should be added to a work card specific Library, which is accessible on the work card.

  • Additionally, this shared file or link should be added to the total project Library, located in the left sidebar of the project, where all shared files or links on the project are accessible.

  • The closed work card should display a count of files/links shared on that work card.

  • The opened work card should have a Library section where users can view all files/links shared on that work card.

title: Focus Issue after Hiding the Electron App
body:
Describe the bug

After hiding the electron app, the previously active window doesn't get the focus.

To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior: Make sure External App: Keep Open parameter checked in User Settings, otherwise comment app quits directly instead of hiding

  1. Go to 'GitLens Commit Search'
  2. Select one or several commit(s)
  3. On the right side, select and open a file.
  4. Select a line has a comment.
  5. Click the blue icon at the top, to show the inline comments.
  6. Click one of the Add Comment/Reply or Edit buttons to show the BitBucket Comment App.
  7. Now click on Cancel to hide the app.
  8. The last active window (probably comment viewer), doesn't get the focus. You should click once on that window to give focus again.

See the screen capture: https://youtu.be/S_pe_9A_K8g

Expected behavior

The previously active window should regain focus when the electron app hidden.

Platform:

  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6

Additional context

This issue was mentioned in the previous PR: #41

KNOWN ISSUE

There is a focus issue after hiding the app. The last active window should get focus again, when the app hides. I'll work on this during the review of current changes

Its harder than it looks. Most likely I will have to open an issue and a PR for this in the electron repo.

On Windows and Linux (not tested on Linux, but documents says so), the last active window automatically regains the focus when BrowserWindow.hide method used, but, this is not the case on macOS. There are macOS specific methods like app.hide

app.hide is exactly what we are looking for. It hides the app and gives the focus to the previous app. However, there are issues at usage of it together with app.dock.hide

app.dock.hide sets the canHide flag of the app to false, so app.hide or any other methods can't hide it, even if it's an native solution (the OS blocks)

See the code: https://github.com/electron/electron/blob/master/atom/browser/browser_mac.mm#L324

Setting this flag is actually not required,

TransformProcessType(&psn, kProcessTransformToUIElementApplication); was enough.

but I think they used it to prevent user from hiding the app (so a easy solution). Because when you hide the dock icon with only this line, it will be shown again once the app deactivated and activated again.(hide/show)

Probably I'll make some modifications that doesn't change canHide flag but listens activation and deactivation events.

In the meantime, we have some options:

  • We might leave the app as it is for now, until the issue solved or (if I open) my PR merged.

    • Pro(s):
      1. The same as the current app
    • Con(s):
      1. Focusing issue remains a bit more

  • We might use BrowserWindow.minimize method to minimize the app and then we can hide the dock icon.

    • Pro(s):

      1. The previous window will properly get focus again.
      1. We'll be able to hide dock icon.

    • Con(s):

      1. User will see a minimization animation.

  • We might package the electron app, so we can pass some parameters in the info.plist file. LSUIElement parameter should be helpful here.

    • Pro(s):
      1. We get the desired output
    • Con(s):
      1. Editing configuration files is not recommended
      1. To package the app platform specific(.exe, .app etc), probably we need to write some scripts that will work on installation, to do the job. Otherwise we should package for all possible platforms

title: Bitbucket OAuth2 authentication investigation and suggestion
body:
As discussed in #58

By the way, I think it's better to use OAuth2 instead of raw username/password

https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/bitbucket/oauth-2/ https://developer.atlassian.com/bitbucket/api/2/reference/meta/authentication#oauth-2

OAuth2 also saves the user from logging in every time

If user is already logged in before to BitBucket in his default browser (chrome for example), then we can get token with OAuth2

If he is not logged in, then he will be redirected to BitBucket's own login page.

That's a good improvement, but we'll hold on for now and get the client's feedback.

title: Paths for cross-platform support
body:
See https://gitlab.com/aggregated-git-diff/aggregated-git-diff-bug-bash/issues/85

This will be happened if you have added comment from another platform

Windows treats paths with backward slashes like src\commands\showCommitSearch.ts

If you added a comment from Linux or macOS its added with forward slashes src/commands/showCommitSearch.ts

BitBucket also seems doesn't apply any normalization to paths, returns them as they are. So

any comment added from Windows will be returned as src\commands\showCommitSearch.ts any comment added from Linux or macOS will be returned as src/commands/showCommitSearch.ts Therefore filtering operation returns wrong results

https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens/blob/tc-dev/src/gitCommentService.ts#L147 https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens/blob/tc-dev/src/gitCommentService.ts#L215

In addition, comments with backward slashes seem being returned from API endpoint but they are not being shown on the BitBucket website. It's not consistent in itself. So best way was to replace bacward slashes with forward slashes

This is actally a serious issue I wonder how anyone hasn't realized this until now, maybe no one didn't test on multi platform.

I have included this in another PR, since it's not related to this and this PR already includes too many commits (might be confusing)

However, I'm not sure if there is any other part being affected from this issue It needs testing

One more thing, comment viewer app shows Edit and Delete buttons for all comments. But I'm not allowed to Edit or Delete someone else's comment. So if I try to do this, API returns 401 or 403 and extension thinks BitBucket credentials are wrong but the reality is API endpoint doesn't allow me for this action.

Since it thinks BitBucket credentials are wrong, clears credentials and this causes the extension wants user to re-login, while credentials were already correct

https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens/blob/tc-dev/src/gitCommentService.ts#L610 https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens/blob/tc-dev/src/gitCommentService.ts#L661

I think

Delete and Edit buttons should not be shown if the comment is not added by me, or I'm not the owner (or one of maintainers) of the repo or

If we keep them for all comments, extension needs to warn user that he is not allowed for this action, instead of "BitBucket credentials are wrong", and should not clear credentials Btw, I don't know if repo owner or maintainers have the right to delete/edit someone else's comment

title: Show no authority to edit/delete instead of letting user relogin.
body:
As discussed in #85

Here I've made my test repo public: https://bitbucket.org/cagdas001/testinganapp

To Reproduce

  1. Clone the repo

  2. Open the repo folder in VSCode

  3. Try to Edit or Delete one of my comments You'll get "Incorrect BitBucket credentials"

  4. Try to do any action needs authentication, e.g. try to edit another comment. It wants you to re-login, but credentials were correct

You can also add some comments so I can test if repo owner can delete/edit someone else's comment

In addition, most of comments in this repo have been added from Windows, so it will be a good testing repo for #91

Let's fix it, if the user has logged in, but has no authority to edit/delete other's comments, let's just prompt "You don't have authority to edit", and won't let the user to re-login.

I'll create a new ticket for you to fix it and pay you as well for the bug hunt. Thanks.

title: Line comments are being added into wrong commit
body:
Describe the bug

BitBucket supports in-line comments for commits, so we support this feature in the extension too. However, DecorationController and Comment Viewer app. currently get commit info of selected line from blame. The purpose of blame information in the extension is to provide quick summary about lines. (author, commit message etc)

But,

DecorationController and Comment Viewer app. currently get commit info of selected line from blame

with this way, we get different commits for lines even in the same file. Consequently, DecorationController and Comment Viewer app. (and others which get this info) sends API requests with wrong commits, which causes unexpected results

To Reproduce

  1. Open the Commit Search view.
  2. Select one or several commit(s)
  3. Click on a file to open the diff view. Note the commit hash you selected. This can be seen in both Commit Search and Diff View (title).
  4. Select a line and note its commit hash. This can be seen by hovering on the blame info. (appears right to the line)
  5. Click blue icon and add a comment. Then Click Close
  6. Select a different line and note its commit hash. This can be seen by hovering on the blame info. (appears right to the line) Make sure this line comes from a different commit within the 4th step.
  7. Click blue icon and add a comment. Then Click Close
  8. Go to the BitBucket website/your repo/commits.
  9. Find the file commit from 3rd step. See, neither of your comments can be seen in here. However, we were actually reviewing this commit in the Diff View.
  10. Find the line commit from 4th step. See, the comment is only visible in this commit.
  11. Find the line commit from 6th step. See, the comment is only visible in this commit.

Expected behavior

Line comments should be added into the File Commit that we're reviewing in the Diff View, instead of commits from blame info.

Actual behaviour

Comments are being added into individual commits of lines, instead of the commit we're reviewing in the Diff View. It is almost impossible for someone to read comments (reviews/feedbacks) with this way. The one who wants to read reviews, has to go to 3 different commits (for e.g.) in order to read 3 in-line comments.

Screenshots

Additional context

DecorationController and Comment Viewer app. currently get commit info of selected line from blame

Here are the related code blocks:

https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens/blob/tc-dev/src/gitCommentService.ts#L203

const commit = lineState !== undefined ? lineState.commit : undefined;

https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens/blob/tc-dev/src/gitCommentService.ts#L228

GitCommentService.commentViewerCommit = commit;

https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens/blob/tc-dev/src/annotations/commentsDecoratorController.ts#L73

                const blameLine = this._activeEditor.document.isDirty
                    ? await Container.git.getBlameForLineContents(
                        trackedDocument.uri,
                        i,
                        this._activeEditor.document.getText()
                    )
                    : await Container.git.getBlameForLine(trackedDocument.uri, i);
                if (blameLine === undefined) continue;
                const commit = blameLine.commit;

title: Comment Operations Don't Work
body:
The comment operations don't work at all. (adding/replying/deleting/editing)

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Clone/checkout the tc-dev-merge-to-9.4.1 branch.
  2. Run
npm install
npm run build
  1. Open the root directory of project with VSCode.
  2. Start debugging (Press F5)
  3. If its not open, open a file in the editor. (you may have to wait for a couple of seconds for activation)
  4. Select/click any line from the file
  5. Click on the Blue icon/button at the right-top corner, to open up the Comment Viewer app.
  6. Login to BitBucket if necessary
  7. On the Comment Viewer app. window, try to do some comment actions.

Expected Result

Comment operations should properly work.

Actual Result

Comment operations don't work at all.

Additional Context

If you check the console output, we're getting the following error.

ERR command 'gitlens.manageComments' not found: Error: command 'gitlens.manageComments' not found

I have not yet deeply investigated this, but, my guess is, probably new version overrides (or renames) some of our specific commands. If this is the case, you should add the gitlens.manageComments (and related functions) from the tc-dev branch.

So have a look at commands.ts

title: Commit Search view cannot be opened
body:
Commit Search view cannot be opened

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Clone/checkout the tc-dev-merge-to-9.4.1 branch.
  2. Run
npm install
npm run build
  1. Open the root directory of project with VSCode.
  2. Start debugging (Press F5)
  3. On the left tab, Click on the GitLens logo.
  4. Find the Search icon and click on it.

Expected Result

Commit Search view should be opened. You can check it out on tc-dev branch

Actual Result

We can't open the Commit Search view

Additional Context

If you check the console output, we're getting the following error.

[2019-02-13 10:32:58:414] ShowCommitSearchCommand
TypeError: Cannot read property 'webview' of undefined

Take a look at Additional Context section of #105. Probably a similar case again.

One thing to note here, Commit Search view is a specific view/page for this extended version. (you can check it on tc-dev branch) But, as far as I understand, v9.4.1 of original GitLens extension uses a different approach for commit search.

So if its preferred to keep the old functionality as it is, the old (from tc-dev) commands and functions should be used again.

title: File not found - welcome.html
body:
The original GitLens extension shows welcome.html on first-time installation, or when a new update installed. Its basically a file that introduces the extension (or changelog for the installed update).

There is no welcome.html in the current branch, this is causing console errors.

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Clone/checkout the tc-dev-merge-to-9.4.1 branch.
  2. Run
npm install
npm run build
  1. Open the root directory of project with VSCode.
  2. Start debugging (Press F5) and wait for the extension to be activated.
  3. On the VSCode window, Go to the Help -> Toggle Developer Tools
  4. On the console view, to the Console section.

Expected Result

This file should not cause any warning/error.

Actual Result

Since this file cannot be found, its causing errors on the console.

Possible Fix

  • A welcome page specific to this extended version can be prepared. In this case, just naming it as welcome.html will be enough. The extension should show it on first-time installation or on an update.

title: No Functionality to import training data into application
body:
Background:

Current Maturity of Employee is calculated based on tasks / courses completed by employee. Tasks are assigned via third party tool and task completion status is available in form of excel report.

What is missing:

It was observed that there is no functionality to import course data from excel sheet. It is possible to manually mark task as complete / incomplete ; But user cannot bulk import task completion data.

What is required:

Provision to bulk import training data into TCA application.

title: Cannot install dependencies after cloning repo
body:
1. Steps to reproduce

clone the repository and execute npm i

2. Current results

The command fails with the error: npm ERR! 404 Not Found: event-stream@3.3.6

3. Expected results

The command should succeed in installing the dependencies

Comments

The error occurs because the package was removed from npm registry due to security issues details-about-the-event-stream-incident

To fix this is necessary to upgrade the vscode dependency to version 1.1.25 in package.json: "vscode": "^1.1.25"

title: Comment is not correlated to a file
body:
If we put a comment on a file, we also can see the comment on others file.

1. Steps to reproduce

  • Open Gitlens Menu
  • Click on the search button to open the new UI
  • Select one or several commits.
  • Click one file of the diff window and open the diff details.
  • Login to bitbucket if necessary
  • Enter your Bitbucket account email and password and click Submit button
  • Put cursor to a random line.
  • Click blue bookmark icon, and add a comment.
  • Back to search page and open another file.
  • Put cursor on a line that we've commented before.
  • Click blue bookmark icon.

2. Current results

We will see a comment in multiple files.

3. Expected results

We should only see a comment on the correlated file.

Video demo

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1OSs2LXz_zCkVH7DhUaI7XDrF4WyeXAot

title: Comments stick on a line, not adjust to the diff changes
body:
If we put a comment on a line, the comment will stick on the line even though we on another different diff changes.

1. Steps to reproduce

  • Open Gitlens Menu
  • Click on the search button to open the new UI
  • Select one or several commits.
  • Click one file which has multi-line diff changes.
  • Login to bitbucket if necessary
  • Enter your Bitbucket account email and password and click Submit button
  • Put cursor to a random line on the right side of the window.
  • Click blue bookmark icon, and add a comment.
  • Put cursor to a random line on the left side of the window.

2. Current results

We will see a comment in the same line number even though the code was changed.

3. Expected results

The comment should adjust the position based on diff changes.

Video demo

https://drive.google.com/open?id=19Qpy4y2-398087ZTd55TDRYseQzx4Kzn

title: Comment editor is not being initialized with empty content when adding reply
body:
The comment editor app initializes itself with the comment text, when adding a reply. It should initialize with empty content.

Steps to Reproduce

  1. If debug is running stop it and start again (this is important)
  2. Go to GitLens tab from the left side
  3. Click on the Search icon right side to the Explorer title, to open the Commit Search
  4. Select one or several commit(s)
  5. Click on a file to open the diff window
  6. Place the cursor on a line has comment(s)
  7. Click the blue icon at the top to open the Comment Viewer app
  8. Login to BitBucket if necessary
  9. On the Comment Viewer app, click the Reply button on any comment

Actual Result

Comment editor initializes itself with the comment text

Expected Result

Comment editor should be initialized with empty content when adding replies

Additional Context

This is happening when the app initialized, so if keepOpen set to True (default), you'll see this only the first time, app will stay open after the first initialization and work properly. If keepOpen set to False, you'll see this any time you Reply a comment.

Video screencast

https://youtu.be/HZI75H5cR_k

title: Comment Viewer app doesn't render mentions
body:
Comment Viewer app. doesn't render mentions

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Go to the GitLens tab from the left side
  2. Click on the Search icon (right to the Explorer title), to open the Commit Search view
  3. Select a commit, and take its commit hash
  4. Click on a file from right side
  5. Click on the red or blue button (place the cursor on a line if you'll click blue button)
  6. Click Add Comment
  7. Mention someone in your comment and Save
  8. Observe, Comment Viewer doesn't render it
  9. Go to bitbucket.org
  10. Open your repo and go to the Commits
  11. Search the commit hash you have from the 3. step
  12. Open it and observe, how BitBucket renders it

Actual Results

Comment viewer app doesn't render mentions in comments

Expected Results

Comment viewer app should render mentions in the same way as BitBucket

The mention should be rendered as a link, by clicking the link, we can visit the home page of the user.

Screenshots

BitBucket Comment Viewer

title: Edit Roadmap fields validation like on Create New Roadmap
body:
• Edit Roadmap need same fields validation like on Create New Roadmap
  • Make sure each fields follow the same implementation for required fields
  • Need show the message if user not filled the message
  • The required field validations on 'Save' when you're editing do not work the same was as they do when you're creating a roadmap. There's a couple issues here associated with Edit Roadmap:
  • When you add a new KPI on the create flow you're required to have a group and target date. These fields should be required in edit mode too. What's happening is if you don't add a group and target date and you hit save, it doesn't do anything. There are no required field messages and no save message. There needs to be a message stating those fields are required on save (same as create workflow).
  • Also, I did notice that if you add a KPI and just add the group and not the target date and hit save it says your edits were saved, however they're not because it's still looking for the target date field. This same functionality should be for the Value Stream strategy and Outcomes tab. When you're in edit and you add a new Value Stream strategy you should be required to complete the target date field same as in the Create new roadmap workflow.
  • Also, when you're in edit roadmap and you're adding a new outcome, you should be required to enter the target date as well

title: Password rules are not same between "Create Account" & "Forgot Password?" pages
body:
Reproduction Steps

  1. Launch app
  2. Click on "Create Account", and check Password rules
  3. Navigate back and click on "Forgot Password?", and enter Email id
  4. Click the Password reset link sent to above email-id
  5. Check Password rules in "Forgot Password", and compare with rules captured in Step2

Expected Result

Same password rules should be there in both "Create Account" & "Forgot Password?" pages

Actual Result

No Password rules/validations in "Create Account" page. Password rules are not same between "Create Account" & "Forgot Password?" pages

Please use uppercase letters (X,Y,Z...), lowercase letters (x,y,z...), numbers (1,2,3,4...) and special characters (!"'#$%&*()+,-.:;<=>?@[]^_`{|}~) in the password

title: Change 'Value Stream Strategy Description' name to 'Target Outcomes' and 'Outcomes' to 'Incremental Outcomes'
body:
• Please change the following field labels:
    • 'Value Stream Strategy Description' to 'Target Outcomes'
    • 'Outcomes' to 'Incremental Outcomes'
  • These changes should be made to all data points that reference the field names. This would apply to Create, Edit and View Roadmap details.
  • Changes should be on back and front end to ensure extracts used for reporting are coming through with the updated field names.
  • Attached is a word document with all the places these changes need to be made and what to change it to: Change_to_Value_Stream_Strategy_and_Outcome_names.docx

title: After Commissioning > After Parsing USB device data is not deleted

title: 'General Settings': firmware bin gets duplicated from 2nd upload on wards
body:
Steps: Click 'Asset Management'-> System Add Device. Updated device with proper values so that validation should be passed.

Click 'General Settings' Upload "firmware.bin" Click on 'Asset Management'-> System -> Expert mode -> Firmware Upgrade

Come back to 'General Settings' Upload "firmware2.bin" Click on 'Asset Management'-> System -> Expert mode -> Firmware Upgrade

Come back to 'General Settings' Observed "firmware.bin" gets duplicated Upload "test.bin" Click on 'Asset Management'-> System -> Expert mode -> Firmware Upgrade

Come back to 'General Settings' Observed that all previous .bin file gets duplicated.

Expected: firmware bin should not get duplicated.

title: Asset Management-> System -> Device : device list shows password clearly it should be hidden with ****
body:
Steps:

Click 'Asset Management' -> "System" Add Device. Updated device with proper values so that validation should be passed. Select that device and enable "Expert Mode" from top right corner. Now, Click on Device list "Hide/Show columns" Enable all expert mode checkbox Specially "Activate LCD password". Then Click Done. Now, View the device. if needed scroll right side.

title: User registration changes
body:
@suppermancool - We need to add a separate call after creating a user on the registration form:

GET /serviceendpoints/company?tld=...

Example:

http://174.129.220.35:8000/serviceendpoints/company?tld=in.asolutionscorp.com

Response:

{
    "companyId": "7a49ae7edb33a700ab2cf3c61d961969",
    "companyTld": "in.asolutionscorp.com",
    "companyStatus": "Approved",
    "companyName": "Advance Solutions Corporation",
    "status": "Invalid",
    "message": "Company found",
    "found": true
}

What we're looking at is:

  1. That a company is returned (try tld=google.com to see a company not found)
  2. That the companyStatus value is Approved

The tld field is the domain of the developer's email address. For instance, jmgasper@gmail.com has a domain of gmail.com. aabbott@topcoder.com has a domain of topcoder.com.

Here's what we're going to do for different states of this company response:

No company found

If no company comes back in the response, we will automatically redirect the user to the create company form (/registration/x1/company).

Approved company (companyStatus = Approved)

We will make a separate API call (TBD, so just a placeholder for now we can fill in later), and then redirect the user to the success message

Rejected company (companyStatus = Rejected)

We will send the user to a new page, like /registration/developer/company-rejected. The layout should be similar to the success page, but we'll have a different message, like:

Your company's registration for the X1 developer program has been rejected. If you think this has happened in error, please contact us to resolve the issue.

Pending company (companyStatus = Pending)

We will send the user to a new page, like /registration/developer/company-pending. The layout should be similar to the success page, but we'll have a different message, like:

Your company's registration for the X1 developer program is still pending. Once your company has been approved, you will receive a welcome email detailing how to login to the site.

title: Display developer's email address in the Company Registration success screen
body:
Replace XXX with the user's email

URL /registration/developer/company-pending

title: Implement waiting screen in iOS
body:
• We are now enforcing waiting list in event. Therefore we should update mobile applications to show the correct info.

  • When an user registers to an event and it's not approved, but have status "WaitingApproval" from backend, mobile application must:

  1. Hide register button and show unregister button.
  2. Show a message that the user is in waiting list.
  3. All the other info for Event and Session should behave the same way as an unregistered user (check flag currentUserAttendeeApproved and currentUserAttendee).
  • Must be confirmed that during the register process the correct popup message is shown to the user (Approved or Waiting List).

title: Final Changes to iOS
body:
1- Update to latest models (Check swagger and postman).

2- When creating event attendee a ticket and payment option needs to be selected. Those are embedded into event object. Mobile already has this screen to select ticket and payment option. Just need to hook with backend. If ticket is free payment option can be null.

3- Add live chat support when event is live (ongoing) - backend is done (Socket.io). Admin frontend has already advanced development for that one.

4- Maybe we can add a indication in event listting and details when event is live (some label in red indicating live event on top of thumbnail would work). And we add a new option in Event details called Live Chat. This will direct to a screen like Direct Messages.

5- If ticketsLeft for a ticket option is zero you set paymentOptions to null (skip payment options screen) and don’t show the payment options popup. Check results of POST /eventAttedees. If status = WaitingApproval you show waiting approval popup.

** Added **

Implement fixes from the files below:

DEMO_ISSUES_FROM_ANDRIOD.docx

Event_App_IOS_FIX.docx

Any comments please post here. Thanks

title: Refresh the hover after adding/deleting/editing a comment
body:
Describe the bug After adding/deleting/editing a comment/reply, the hover is not updated immediately. We have to move the mouse out then hover on it again to see the result. We should refresh the hover immediately after adding/deleting/editing a comment/reply.

To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:

  1. Go to the GitLens options
  2. Click on the search button to open the new UI
  3. Select one or several commits.
  4. Click one file of the diff window and open the diff details.
  5. Hover on a commit and add/edit/delete an inline comment.
  6. Login to your Bitbucket account if necessary.
  7. You see the hover is not updated, you have to move the mouse out and hover on it again to see the result.

Expected behavior The hover should be refreshed immediately after adding/deleting/editing a comment/reply.

Screenshots See this screencast: https://monosnap.com/file/gsbRmsr7ryhkaDgJm8uHYcPjdoUFWC

Desktop (please complete the following information):

  • OS: All
  • Browser N/A
  • Version All

title: The aggregated diff window should not scroll with the commit lists
body:
Describe the bug The aggregated diff window is scrolling with the commit lists, so if the commit lists are long, it’s not convenient for users to view the aggregated diff. The aggregated diff should be pinned on the top and won’t scroll with the commit list.

To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:

  1. Go to the GitLens options
  2. Click on the search button to open the new UI
  3. Select several commits and the aggregated diff window with file tree view will appear on the right side.
  4. Scroll the screen down
  5. The aggregated diff window is scrolling up along with the commits, so users can't see the diff window if they select commits in the bottom.

Expected behavior The aggregated diff should be pinned on the top and won’t scroll with the commit list.

Screenshots See this screencast: https://monosnap.com/file/UCLS7M4HOmM6A5JFAlikSJ1XdE9mes

  • OS: All
  • Browser N/A
  • Version All

To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:

  1. Go to the GitLens options
  2. Click on the search button to open the new UI
  3. Select one or several commits.
  4. Click one file of the diff window and open the diff details.
  5. Hover on a commit and add an inline comment, with Markdown text, like **This is a text**.
  6. Login to your Bitbucket account if necessary.
  7. The Markdown text is not rendered, you see "This is a text" is not bold.

Expected behavior The markdown text should be rendered properly.

title: Multiline comments support
body:
Describe the bug On VS Code (GitLens), we can only input a single line comment, there is no way to support multiline comment. But on the Bitbucket website, we can input multiline comment. VS Code side should support multiline comment too.

To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:

  1. Go to the GitLens options
  2. Click on the search button to open the new UI
  3. Select one or several commits.
  4. Click one file of the diff window and open the diff details.
  5. Hover on a commit and add an inline comment.
  6. Login to your Bitbucket account if necessary.
  7. Click add a comment.
  8. You see you can input multiline comment on the prompted text on the top.

Expected behavior VS Code side should support multiline comment too.

Screenshots See this screencast to reproduce the issue: https://monosnap.com/file/z1y7vT3NcqViXCeYH3jeIlus1Rcsc2

title: Duplicated branches on the list
body:
Describe the bug The branches are duplicated in the new UI of GitLens.

To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:

  1. Go to the GitLens options
  2. Click on the search button to open the new UI
  3. Click the branch drop-down list.
  4. See some branches are duplicated.

Expected behavior The branches in the dropdown list should be correct. If the git repo has multiple remote streams, the branch name should be remote

For example, if the repo has streams like

bitbucket	https://billsedison@bitbucket.org/billsedison/gitlens-test.git (fetch)
bitbucket	https://billsedison@bitbucket.org/billsedison/gitlens-test.git (push)
origin	https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens.git (fetch)
origin	https://github.com/billsedison/vscode-gitlens.git (push)
upstream	https://github.com/eamodio/vscode-gitlens.git (fetch)
upstream	https://github.com/eamodio/vscode-gitlens.git (push)

The branch should be

  bitbucket/master
  bitbucket/tc-dev
  origin/HEAD -> origin/master
  origin/demo
  origin/develop
  origin/feature/explorers-rework
  origin/feature/line-history
  origin/feature/save-results
  origin/master
  origin/tc-dev
  upstream/demo
  upstream/develop
  upstream/feature/explorers-rework
  upstream/feature/line-history
  upstream/feature/save-results
  upstream/master

title: SECVULN-9418 CORS setup
body:
From the client:

An HTML5 cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) policy controls whether and how content running on other domains can perform two-way interaction with the domain that publishes the policy. The policy is fine-grained and can apply access controls per-request based on the URL and other features of the request. Steps:

  1. Intercept a request using Burp
  2. Change the 'origin' header parameter to some arbitrary source
  3. Observe the response header 'Allow-Control-Allow-Origin'. Suggested solution: Any inappropriate domains should be removed from the CORS policy.

title: Container timing off
body:
Currently we are starting the timer for how long the solver container runs right before we execute the docker-compose run command. This artificially inflates the run time of the container as it includes the build time for the image. Proposed solution:

  • do not use the --rm flag when executing the container. This flag removes the container after it executes.
  • use the docker API's container inspection endpoint to extract start and end times for the container.
  • remove the container when complete.

The docker API can be called via HTTP over local sockets. see this

title: Final Scoring mode
body:
For final scores let's do the following:

  • create a environment variable driven config for "isFinalScoring" mode
  • when in isFinalScoring more
    • run the system tests instead of the provisional tests
    • post a reviewSummation record to the reviewSummation API instead of a review with:
      • final score value for the aggregateScore
      • scoreCardId the same as the configured review scoreCardId
      • isPassing is true
      • metadata should be the same as would be posted in review record

title: Scoring Type Event Driven Override
body:
Recently we've added in the ability for the scorer to respond to an additional "score" event. This arrives on the submission.notification.score topic and looks like this:

{
  "id": "b1dc45fb-3d35-4e76-b9b2-7c608ece4337",
  "submissionId": "230e5f06-740b-4c20-bdd6-dee0519f8838",
  "typeId": "bcf2b43b-20df-44d1-afd3-7fc9798dfcae",
  "resource": "score"
}

we've now added one more field to that event to indicate what testType to run:

{
  "id": "b1dc45fb-3d35-4e76-b9b2-7c608ece4337",
  "submissionId": "230e5f06-740b-4c20-bdd6-dee0519f8838",
  "typeId": "bcf2b43b-20df-44d1-afd3-7fc9798dfcae",
  "resource": "score",
  "testType": "provisional"
}

This value should override the configured IS_FINAL_SCORING values here and here

In this way we can have the scorer in a default testing mode for when submissions come in naturally or an override when we command it to run a submission through the aforementioned score event

                        "LITMUS.KD018_MCF7_96H_X1_B42"
                    ],

body:

title: Platform: Sidebar
body:
Explore visually and build the final UI specification for the sidebar component.

To Design:

  • Connect sidebar explorations
  • Community sidebar exploration
  • Final polishes to the menu
  • Block layout system
  • Explore sidebar on mobile
  • Project status manual control in sidebar (pause or cancel a project)

Overview Streamline experience for TC users we will adopt a standard sidebar navigation experience that is consistent between Connect and the Community.

Requirements

  • We will remove the top-level tabs of Dashboard, Scope, and Project Plans
  • We will still display the project status in the left sidebar, but controls over modifying project status will be updated (re: Feature in Project Plan - Integrate/Automate Project Status)
  • Beneath the project status we will be creating the following tabs:
  • Dashboard: This will be the default page/tab that is opened when a user accesses a project. It will show both the full project plan and the scope card.
  • Discussions: This tab will reflect all project discussions in a single repository, including the discussions occurring on individual project plan work cards as well as stand-alone discussion threads.
  • Library: This tab will reflect a single repository of all files and links shared in the project, including those shared in project plan discussions as well as stand-alone discussion threads.
  • Reports: This tab will eventually reflect reports created on the project, including financial burndown, progress burndown, and delivery-specific reports, such as QA results.
  • Team Management: This tab will support the current team management capabilities, including inviting and removing users from a project.
  • Underneath the primary navigation tabs in the left sidebar, the current project Topcoder and customer members will be displayed. Architects should be called out separately from Topcoder project members, as this is a professional service that customers are paying for and it would be good to highlight who is their Architect.

title: Implement Logout
body:
While we don't have design for logout yet in top nav, it will presumably live under the user dropdown in the upper right hand corner.

While we get the UI, lets add a "Logout" option that when selected, logs the current user out of the site and navigates them to /login

The look and feel of the drop down should match the rest of the header menus

We will:

  • Delete any tokens from local storage / session
  • Make a JS call to GET /serviceendpoints/logout (final details TBD)
  • Redirect the user to /login.

title: Email registrants Application error (ASAP FIX or workaround)
body:
Ed is looking to email the applicants for today on one of his training sessions. There are 159 of them.

As he goes in to admin mode and click "email registrants" he get this:

Application error
An error occurred in the application and your page could not be served. If you are the application owner, check your logs for details. You can do this from the Heroku CLI with the command heroku logs --tail

He needs to move this session, and notify everyone - but gets that error

Analysis:

Based on our analysis of the problem, we initially thought this is due to certain users not having email addresses associated with their accounts, but I don't think that's the case, as I checked the prod database and things look like everyone has email addresses.

From what I can tell, the site is timing out on Heroku when sending that many emails. We need a suggestion on what can be updated or changed to allow this to work. We can potentially update the process to send emails in chunks or something else, to keep things under the limit.

NOTE - This app is deployed on Heroku, so any solution will need to work there.

here is the Physical keyboard Mapping..

    m_controlKeys.insert(Qt::Key_M,"MENU");

title: Pressing Enter in enter search text field doesn't start searching
body:
When typing in "enter search text" field (optionally also in enter author here field), pressing Enter key should start the Searching. This is better for UX.

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Go to the GitLens tab from the left side
  2. Click on the Search icon (right to the Explorer title), to open the Commit Search view
  3. Type a word in enter search text field.
  4. Press Enter

Actual Results

Pressing Enter in the enter search text or enter author here (optional) field doesn't search

Expected Results

Pressing Enter in the enter search text or enter author here (optional) field should start searching

title: Comment Viewer app should stay on top
body:
Clicking somewhere outside of the app causes user to lose app view

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Go to the GitLens tab from the left side
  2. Click on the Search icon (right to the Explorer title), to open the Commit Search view
  3. Select one or several commit(s)
  4. Click on a file from the right side, to open the diff view
  5. Place the cursor on any line
  6. Click on any button (red or blue buttons) that opens the Comment Viewer app
  7. Login to BitBucket if necessary
  8. After the app has opened, click somewhere outside of the app. E.g. click on a line in the VSCode window

Actual Results

Clicking somewhere outside of the app sends the app to behind of other apps, and user to lose the app

Expected Results

  • App should stay always on top

or

  • Implement an easy/quick way to restore the app to its previos state (registering a hotkey event is possible, e.g. Ctrl/Cmd + 1)

If second way is chosen, the same way has to be integrated also with the Comment Editor app. (it currently stays always on top)

Additional Context

Finding a solution to this probably will solve the #59 too.

Video Screencast

title: Enhancement Proposal: Add Code Highlighting Feature for Comment Viewer and Comment Editor apps
body:
Comment Viewer and Comment Editor (preview mode) apps currently display code blocks with no highlighting. UX and visuality might be improved by adding a highlighting feature.

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Go to the GitLens tab from the left side
  2. Click on Search icon to open up the Commit Search window
  3. Select one or several commit(s)
  4. Click on a file from the right side, to open the diff window
  5. Click on the blue or red icon the open up the Comment Viewer app.
  6. Login to BitBucket if necessary
  7. Click "Add Comment"
  8. Add a code block

You may use this example:

#include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { cout << "Hello, world!" << endl; return 0; }

  1. Click the "Preview" button, Observe.
  2. Click "Save" button, Observe.

Actual Result

Comment Editor App's Preview mode and Comment Viewer app display code blocks with no highlighting

Expected Result

Comment Editor App's Preview mode and Comment Viewer app should display code blocks with highlighting

Actual Result Screenshots

Comment Viewer Comment Editor

Expected Result Screenshots

title: Slider bar in the Commit Search view, doesn't get released even after releasing the mouse button

  2. Click on the Search icon (right to the Explorer title), to open the Commit Search view

Actual Results

Slider bar doesn't get released if you release the mouse button when cursor is out of the container. (refer to the red area in the screenshot)

title: Accessibility | About Us > History - fix tab order
body:
For accessibility, the page links need to be navigatable via the Tab button. On the History page (/about-us/history/), the page content is being skippd. The tab jumps from the Job Search button to the bottom panel, below the history specific content of the page.

The tab order should be updated to traverse through the various panels within the history section from the top down.

title: Move section title from doc def to document
body:
On the diversity and inclusion page, there are sections separating the pages that have labels. These section labels are currently not exposed in the document and must be edited in the doc-def.

This ticket is to refactor the life-at-comcast-diversity-inclusion doc-def to move this value to the document.

title: Browse By Teams - Make cell title clickable
body: Cell is clickable but if you click just the title text, it is not a link.

title: New component and update for How We Hire page
body:
The customer has decided to tweak the How We Hire page in two ways.

1. Replace application process panels with slightly different design and steps.

This has been designed in #563. The task here is to build this component according to the specs. Note: ideally this component should be built not assuming there is 3 fixed steps. If less than three, it should center and space the panels equidistant from each other. If more than three, after the third it should create a new row with the same logic.

2. Add FAQ block

We want to add a FAQ component below the Quotes. We should use the FAQ existing component so ideally this is a lightweight task.

Storyboards

https://gitlab.com/hercules-jobs/storyboards/commit/adf4cec1a2d98f985a613da8f60f9c9405e1dad9

title: New component designs for How We Hire page
body:
The client has requested a design update to a panel in the How We Hire page. The original designs can be found here.

The Application > Assessment > Interviews > Offers component.

It currently looks like this:

The request is to modify it to look like this:

Next Steps

The goal here is to create an updated design for this section of the page based off of the client's mockup. We want it to match the client's mockup but in a good way by a designer that we can hand over to a developer to implement.

title: Calendar Auto Register using SSO
body:
Looking to get a level of effort on how to implement a way for a user to click on a link from P2 or external location to use their SSO to pre-populate their registration information and take them to the confirmation page. (save one step)

Requirements

  • Auto-register a user for a scheduled demo which then just takes them to a confirmation page in eLearning that they’ve been registered. The date/time will be different with each scheduled demo.
  • Preselects registration for myself and auto clicks save.

For the MVP, we are looking for just doing this for Release Demos, possibly in the future for all events.

Another idea is having a "quick register" button that will prepopulate the happy path registration for myself

title: Parent/Child Filters for Training
body:
Add ability to create a parent/ child relationship for trainings and be able to filter trainings

  • "Tags" filter on training page to now be called Topics and keep only Child "tags" (Job Logistics, Surveys & Permits, Estimating Work...)
  • Add an additional filter called "Category" (to the left of "Topic" where a user can filter by parent tag (the highest hierarchy which is the training menu) (e.g. Working a Job, Finance, Labor, etc)

  3. Image properties , url of the image should be from s3 . Ability to link with s3 and preview the image and use it in the rich text editor.
  4. Also an ability to upload an image , the image should be saved in s3 .

title: Prototype Customer delivery with defined scope
body:
Prototype Scenario 1 from the attached document (https://docs.google.com/document/d/11rFj_4C-eV2Fz0APlZa2VOI3gqxcz_AqtJyxZFx1kLU/edit#heading=h.d7nmue4dyw96)

<p></p>

This document outlines screen by screen what is desired to see on each screen for all four scenarios:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/11rFj_4C-eV2Fz0APlZa2VOI3gqxcz_AqtJyxZFx1kLU/edit?usp=sharing

Note: Several screens can be reused throughout the four scenarios. The primary goal is to illustrate a sample end to end workflow for the future work intake, work planning and execution process within Connect against the four scenarios described above.

<p></p>

Use https://share.goabstract.com/0c23b803-75dd-49e4-91c0-228d2e0d345b and https://share.goabstract.com/77cf58df-b5c9-4be6-b5f9-e0e2b742670e to build the screens. Create the prototype in a single sketch file. Create each prototype on its own page. Design for 1280px width. Use the TC Brand Library 2019 for buttons, forms, and fills. Do not redesign the form elements at this point.

<p></p>

Build the prototype as a series of screens in MarvelApp

title: Redesign Veterans.topcoder.com home page
body:
Redesign of the Veterans home page (https://veterans.topcoder.com/) .

We want to clean up the UX of the page and redesign and change the way we present the content.

<p></p>

Visual direction:

  • Use the new color palette from TC Brand Library 19

  • Use some of the visual elements/typography from "Website 3.0 Production" (https://share.goabstract.com/cf82b47a-7929-4cc6-89f9-039ac7aaddec )

  • Replace the posed images of soldiers with a civil life people working on computers. Search in Unsplash or other sources.

  • Keep the soldiers programming in "Learn & Explore" section.

  • Use the monochrome TC logo - we're deprecating the multi color version

<p></p>

Content organization:

  • Replace the slider with a hero banner section. Design 2 versions of the hero slider with different call to action (CTA):

    • Join the veterans community - for not logged in - use some of the content from the join the community slider

    • Learn about crouwdsourcing and Topcoder for joined members

<p></p>

  • Replace the navigation with the black navigation we have at https://share.goabstract.com/57bf20de-6085-4a49-9f5b-8acee0c262d8. You have to adapt it to match the content. Keep the current navigation structure from veterans, but add About Us section

<p></p>

  • Transfer the content of the other 2 sliders as part of the page.

  • Move the latest challenges closer to the top

  • Move the news and updates closer to the top

<p></p>

Explore 2 layout options for the page and try to make it easy to read through, and on-brand.

<p></p>

<p></p>

<p></p>

<p></p>

This issue is observed in "Moto C Plus" and "Samsung Galaxy S7" as well.

title: Key repeat timing should be corrected for long press of Exit or B button.
body:
Observed the below issue while testing the following scenarios in STB.

Scenario 1: Long press(about 3 seconds) of B button, will bring “Voice Guidance screen”. Scenario 2: (Long press Exit button for 3 seconds - Down - Down - 2 ) key combinations will bring diagnostics screen.

Issue is that after Long press of B button or Exit button, if the key is released and if any other key is pressed for navigation, there is no response observed. After 4 to 5 seconds, the other keys are working.

The possible cause of this issue could be, even after releasing the key after long press, the key repeat command is being sent for few more seconds. May be long queue of input. Because of this, there is no response when other keys are pressed.
